sentences.en: Sometimes, I feel I need to dilate my pupils to remain attentive.

sentences.en: Things go well, your eyes dilate, you shake and Im high?

words.tran_cn: 扩张器；[解剖] 扩张肌；使扩张的人

trans.tran_cn: 扩大, 详述, 膨胀
trans.tran_en: if a hollow part of your body dilates or if something dilates it, it becomes wider
